validation_purpose: Test discriminative validity, ideological agnosticism, and ground truth alignment

conservative_dignity.description: Conservative political texts emphasizing dignity, unity, and constructive discourse

conservative_tribalism.description: Conservative political texts emphasizing in-group loyalty and out-group antagonism

progressive_dignity.description: Progressive political texts emphasizing dignity, unity, and constructive discourse

progressive_tribalism.description: Progressive political texts emphasizing in-group loyalty and out-group antagonism

extreme_controls.description: Texts with extreme tribalism characteristics for validation testing
extreme_controls.purpose: Validate framework's ability to detect high tribalism

mixed_controls.purpose: Validate framework's ability to detect nuanced discourse

selection_criteria: Sufficient length for reliable analysis (>200 words)
Published or delivered in public contexts

validation_strategy.expert_review: Texts reviewed by research team for category assignment
validation_strategy.ground_truth_controls: Extreme and mixed controls for validation

H1_discriminative_validity.description: Framework distinguishes dignity from tribalism within political orientations

H2_ideological_agnosticism.description: Framework measures dignity/tribalism independently of political orientation
H2_ideological_agnosticism.expected_outcome: No significant differences between political orientations within discourse styles

H3_ground_truth_alignment.description: Framework produces expected scores for validation controls
H3_ground_truth_alignment.expected_outcome: Strong positive correlation (r > 0.7) with expected scores
